item.title: My Data Science Skills & Tools
item.description:
Here is a selection of my Data Science skills and tools that turned out to be helpful in my work and I believe are important for any Data Scientist as well.

The last update of this post was done: 2017-06-16.

  1. Data Manipulation
    • Fast data manipulation with R packages:
      dplyr, data.table, reshape2.
    • Working with dates and time-series:
      lubridate, xts.
